body: We will replace this component and will use OpenStudio 2 once it's officially out. You may try to get it fixed as it is but then I'm afraid that you can't access any of the model arguments because of OpenStudio API limitations. See this discussion: [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/290](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/290)
